name: Lirby Ground Walker
description:
It's Lirby! Loosely based on Kirby Air Rider, this is my Brackey's game jam submission for 2023.1! Collect upgrades before the time runs out! But the end of that round is only the new beginning of a minigame using the stats from round 1! Best not on full screen! Enjoy!

PS camera sensitivity is weirdly high when uploaded to itch so move your mouse slowly. Also
